title: Gypsy Cradle
description: Eleven months after saving herself from an obsessed killer with the help of her new boyfriend Connor, Gypsy’s peace is disturbed again by a strange vision. Accompanied by a rocking cradle, an eerie little girl named Isabella tells Gypsy that Connor’s niece Christie is in danger from someone she trusts. But Christie isn’t ready to listen to Gypsy’s warning—a consequence of the choices Gypsy had to make to save herself from a killer in Christie and Connor’s own family. Trying to rescue her regardless will strain Gypsy’s relationship with all of Christie’s loved ones, including Connor. Only the strange spirit girl, Isabella, and Gypsy’s beloved niece Renee can help her conduct a psychic investigation to find and stop a would-be killer.
author: Andrea Drew
